extendedInfo.description: Wonderful fantastic story of lovely white rabbit. White rabbit's blink and a pretty expression are paid to attention."Dream Monday Family" can also use the wallpapers of this app.We recommend "Dream Monday Family" to the customer who purchased some our live wallpapers and want to use many wallpaper.https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.dmf.wall.DMFLwpSub*To use:Menu>Wallpapers>LiveWallpapers->Rabbit Dream Story*Portrait only.*Please try the free version first.https://market.android.com/details?id=com.dmf.wall.RabbitDreamStoryFree*The scrolling depends behavior of Home application.If scrolling does not work or something strange, try to check Home app's settings.(scrolling speed, overshoot, etc.)*Please resetting if the screen turn black when updating it with setting the wallpaper.Japanesque design

reviews.title: Rabbit Dream Story.....
reviews.comment: The rabbits are one of the cutest & the smartest animals in the world. I can\'t wait till I listen to the details.....
reviews.author: A Google User
